Sam Altman.description: CEO of OpenAI, former Y Combinator president
level_1_facts: Loopt founder sold to Green Dot Corporation 2012
level_2_facts: Invested in Helion Energy nuclear fusion company
Brother Jack Altman CEO of Lattice HR software
Early investor in Reddit and Airbnb
Property ownership San Francisco real estate
Briefly fired from OpenAI board November 2023

Sheryl Sandberg.description: Former Meta COO, author of Lean In
level_1_facts: Google Vice President Sales and Operations 2001-2008
Chief of Staff for Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers
level_2_facts: Board member of Walt Disney Company
Criticized for Facebook's role in 2016 election
Lean In Foundation nonprofit organization founder

Marc Andreessen.description: Co-founder of Andreessen Horowitz, Netscape creator
level_2_facts: Invested in Coinbase, Ripple crypto companies
Controversial tweets on various political topics

notes.purpose: Real public figures with verifiable online information
notes.level_2: Hidden connections requiring consecutive searches and relationship investigation
notes.usage: Run agent on these real people to validate discovery capability
